Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.model

Class SchoolBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.model.SchoolBoard
public class SchoolBoard extends Object
This class represents the board on which each player has their own towers, students and professors on the client side.
Author:
Matteo Negro

    • removeTowers

      public void removeTowers(int number) throws NegativeException, NotEnoughTowersException
      Removes the number of towers by a specified number.
      Parameters:
      number - Number of towers to remove.
      Throws:
      NegativeException - If the number of towers is negative.
      NotEnoughTowersException - If the number of available towers is less than required.
